### Question 1
```{r}
courses <- read_csv(here("courses.csv"))
grades  <- read_csv(here("grades.csv"))
```

```{r}
grades <- read_delim(
  here("grades.csv"),
  delim = ";",
  col_types = cols(
    id        = col_integer(),
    course_id = col_integer(),
    grade     = col_double()
  ),
  show_col_types = FALSE
)
```

```{r}
spec(grades)      
head(grades)
```

### Question 2

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)

courses |>
  arrange(course) |> 
  rename(
    "course name"      = course,
    "identifier"       = course_id,
    "trimester"        = trimester,
    "number of grades" = nb_grades
  ) |>
  kable()

```

## 1.2 Students

### Question 3

```{r}
students <- read_csv(
  here("students.csv"),
  col_types = cols(
    id         = col_integer(),
    group      = col_factor(),
    birth_date = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d"),
    sex        = col_factor()
  )
)
```

The `birth_date` column of the `students` data frame is of class `r class(students$birth_date)`.
The `sex` column of the `students` data frame is of class `r class(students$sex)`
